Name: Pixel Forgemaster
Description: Born from the heart of a molten motherboard, Pixel Forgemaster is a legend in the WebtrES club. With arms and legs forged in the digital foundries of old, he embodies the strength and durability of classic gaming consoles. His screen always displays the iconic imagery of the early gaming era, and the buttons on his chassis are reminiscent of the controllers that started it all. Pixel Forgemaster spends his days reminiscing about the golden age of gaming while crafting pixelated masterpieces, tools, and weapons for other digital entities in the Metaverse. His creations are said to hold the power to unlock hidden levels and secret worlds, coveted by those who yearn for the nostalgia of 8-bit adventures.
